scripts.update-proto-es6: pbjs -t static-module -w es6 -o src/APIRequest.js ../../keeperapp-protobuf/APIRequest.proto && pbts -o src/APIRequest.d.ts src/APIRequest.js
scripts.update-proto-cjs: pbjs -t json-module -w commonjs -o src/APIRequest.js ../../keeperapp-protobuf/APIRequest.proto && pbjs -t static-module -w commonjs ../../keeperapp-protobuf/APIRequest.proto | pbts -o src/APIRequest.d.ts -
